main event: A round yellow object was observed flying in circles near Mitchell Field, New York on 4 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was tracked on ground radar for 15 minutes,The sighting was reported by military personnel,The object was still in sight when the observation period concluded,The flight path of the object was likely caused by a balloon according to conclusions,No photographs were taken during the observation.
location: Mitchell Field, L. I., New York, USA
